verses.verse: Woe <WH1945> to those who are at ease <WH7600> in Zion, <WH6726> and to those who are secure <WH982> on the mountain <WH2022> of Samaria, <WH8111> the notable <WH5344> men of the chief <WH7225> of the nations, <WH1471> to whom the house <WH1004> of Israel <WH3478> come! <WH935>

Go <WH5674> to Calneh, <WH3641> and see; <WH7200> and from there go <WH3212> to Hamath <WH2574> the great; <WH7227> then go down <WH3381> to Gath <WH1661> of the Philistines. <WH6430> are they better <WH2896> than these kingdoms? <WH4467> or is their border <WH1366> greater <WH7227> than your border? <WH1366>
Those who put far away <WH5077> the evil <WH7451> day, <WH3117> and cause the seat <WH7675> of violence <WH2555> to come near; <WH5066>

Who lie <WH7901> on beds <WH4296> of ivory, <WH8127> and stretch <WH5628> themselves on their couches, <WH6210> and eat <WH398> the lambs <WH3733> out of the flock, <WH6629> and the calves <WH5695> out of the midst <WH8432> of the stall; <WH4770>
who strum <WH6527> on the strings <WH6310> of a harp; <WH5035> who invent <WH2803> for themselves instruments <WH3627> of music, <WH7892> like David; <WH1732>

who drink <WH8354> wine <WH3196> in bowls, <WH4219> and anoint <WH4886> themselves with the best <WH7225> oils; <WH8081> but they are not grieved <WH2470> for the affliction <WH7667> of Joseph. <WH3130>
Therefore they will now go captive <WH1540> with the first <WH7218> who go captive; <WH1540> and the feasting <WH4797> and lounging <WH5628> will end. <WH5493>

"The Lord <WH136> Yahweh <WH3069> has sworn <WH7650> by himself, <WH5315>" says <WH5002> Yahweh, <WH3068> the God <WH430> of Armies: <WH6635> "I abhor <WH8374> the pride <WH1347> of Jacob, <WH3290> and detest <WH8130> his fortresses. <WH759> Therefore I will deliver up <WH5462> the city <WH5892> with all that is in it. <WH4393>
It will happen, <WH3498> if there remain ten <WH6235> men <WH582> in one <WH259> house, <WH1004> that they shall die. <WH4191>

"When a man <WH1730>'s relative carries <WH5375> him, <WH5635> even he who burns him, <WH3318> to bring bodies out of the house, <WH1004> and asks <WH559> him who is in the innermost parts <WH3411> of the house, <WH1004> <WH559> 'Is there yet any with you?' And he says, <WH559> <WH657> 'No;' then he will say, <WH559> <WH2013> 'Hush! Indeed we must not mention <WH2142> the name <WH8034> of Yahweh. <WH3068>'
"For, <WH3068> behold, Yahweh commands, <WH6680> and the great <WH1419> house <WH1004> will be smashed <WH5221> to pieces, <WH7447> and the little <WH6996> house <WH1004> into bits. <WH1233>

Do horses <WH5483> run <WH7323> on the rocky <WH5553> crags? <WH2790> Does one plow there with oxen? <WH1241> But you have turned <WH2015> justice <WH4941> into poison, <WH7219> and the fruit <WH6529> of righteousness <WH6666> into bitterness; <WH3939>
you who rejoice <WH8056> in a thing <WH1697> of nothing, <WH3808> who say, <WH559> <WH3947> 'Haven't we taken for ourselves horns <WH7161> by our own strength? <WH2392>'

For, <WH6965> behold, I will raise up against you a nation, <WH1471> house <WH1004> of Israel, <WH3478>" says <WH5002> Yahweh, <WH3068> the God <WH430> of Armies; <WH6635> "and they will afflict <WH3905> you from the entrance <WH935> of Hamath <WH2574> to the brook <WH5158> of the Arabah. <WH6160>"
